alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 1:04PM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts of 50 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Wallace, Osburn, Worley, Hayden, Medimont, Winchester, Mohler, Nezperce, Kellogg, Santa, Coeur d`Alene, Peck, Mullan, Craigmont, Cataldo, Post Falls, St. Maries, Culdesac, Lookout Pass, Lewiston, Waha, Lapwai, Gifford, Kamiah, Fernwood, St. Joe, Pinehurst, Emida. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines, with scattered to numerous power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
